entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who possessed the Cloak on the night Harry's parents died. He is described as having a long history with the Cloak and being impressed by its quality.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has guessed why Dumbledore possessed the Cloak on the night his parents died. He is also referred to as having a father who was involved with the Cloak.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as Harry's father and the one who showed the Cloak to Dumbledore just before he died.

entities.name: hallows
entities.description: The Hallows are mentioned as a dream of Dumbledore's that he had given up on. He takes a closer look at the Cloak because it is one of the Hallows.

relationships.description: Dumbledore possessed the Cloak on the night Harry's parents died.
James was related to the Hallows, as he showed the Cloak to Dumbledore just before he died.
Dumbledore had long since given up his dream of uniting the Hallows, but he could not resist taking a closer look at the Cloak.
